text: @RepMattGaetz I dare you to send this picture to the families of the people who have died from the Coronavirus. See how fucking funny it is then, you cowardly piece of shit. And let's see how this tweet ages. Hopefully the adults can stem the tide of this world-wide health crisis.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
